entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
